title: Design and build Page 3 (replace placeholder with full layout)

requirements.text: Redesign the `/page-3` page to replace the current placeholder card with a fully designed, production-ready page layout that matches the visual quality and structure of Page 2 (hero, content sections, and CTA).
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting `/page-3` no longer shows the current placeholder content (e.g., remove the generic placeholder paragraphs).
Page 3 contains at least: (1) a hero section with headline + supporting text, (2) a multi-card/grid section, (3) a detailed content section (bullets/steps), and (4) a final CTA section.
All sections are responsive (mobile, tablet, desktop) and use existing Tailwind + shadcn/ui components consistently.

requirements.text: Update Page 3 SEO metadata to use a meaningful English title and description aligned with PB Partners Hub and the new Page 3 content, keeping the canonical URL as `/page-3`.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/pages/Page3Page.tsx` uses an updated `<SEO>` title and description (English) that are not generic (avoid “Page 3” / placeholder-style descriptions).

requirements.text: Add clear navigation CTAs on Page 3 that route to existing flows (at minimum `/partner-onboarding` and `/contact`) using the existing button/link patterns used on Page 2.
acceptanceCriteria: Page 3 includes at least two prominent CTA buttons/links that navigate to `/partner-onboarding` and `/contact`.
CTAs use TanStack Router `<Link>` and shadcn `<Button>` styling consistent with other pages (e.g., Page 2).

requirements.text: Apply a coherent visual theme for Page 3 that fits the existing site styling (use existing design tokens and patterns) and keep spacing/typography consistent across sections.
acceptanceCriteria: Page 3 uses consistent typography scale (headings, body), spacing, and section backgrounds (e.g., subtle gradients or muted section backgrounds similar to Page 2).
No new global theme changes are required; styling stays within the existing Tailwind/theme variables.

constraints: Do not edit files in `frontend/src/components/ui` (shadcn components are read-only and must be composed).
Do not modify immutable hook files: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x)`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`.
Keep routing path `/page-3` unchanged (already registered in `frontend/src/App.tsx`).
nonGoals: No backend/canister changes for this request.
No changes to Page 2 behavior/content aside from referencing its UI patterns.
No new authentication or admin features.
